Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.Card

package it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.Card

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BackFace
    The BackFace class represents the back face of a card
    Card
    The Card class represents a basic card in the game It implements the Serializable interface to allow for object serialization
    Corner
    The Corner class represents a corner of a card in the game This class is used in every card, except for objective cards where every corner is BLACK and the symbol is EMPTY
    Face
    The Face class represents a face of a card in the game (front or back) It implements the Serializable interface to allow for object serialization
    FrontFace
    The FrontFace class represents the front face of a card
    GoldCard
    The GoldCard class represents a card that gives points based on certain requirements only if all the criteria are met you can play this card
    ResourceCard
    The ResourceCard class represents a card that provides resources and occasionally points in the game
    StarterCard
    The StarterCard class represents the first card played that initializes the whole playing field
